channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Bixby Voice
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Bixby Voice

item.title: CVE-2023-42543|2024-08-02T19:23:39.772Z -- samsung%20mobile -- bixby%20voice
item.description: Improper verification of intent by broadcast receiver vulnerability in Bixby Voice prior to version 3.3.35.12 allows attackers to access arbitrary data with Bixby Voice privilege.
